charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1101_0100_:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] heard a
rumor that a few sync pairs would be
challenging Steven to a battle at the beach.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1101_0200_:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] decided to swing by but found that the battle
had already ended. Steven stood across from his
opponents, looking cool and confident.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_0300_:
W-we just gotta accept that we lost, guys...
Time to g-get back to training, OK?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0401_0500_:
These sync stones have a truly brilliant shine
to them, don’t they?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0402_0700_:
These sync stones have a truly brilliant shine
to them, don’t they?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_0800_:
Their beauty is different from any other stone
I’ve seen before...
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0301_0900_: Uhh, are you listening to me?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0302_1100_: Looking at rocks on your Poryphone?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_1300_:
Oh! Hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Sorry, I was a bit preoccupied with this stone...
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0402_1700_: I do! And this one is a very special stone!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_1800_:
A stone that can only be found at the bottom of
the ocean near Pasio... A sync stone, of course!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_1900_:
I’ve traveled far and wide to find a stone that
sparkles and shines as perfectly as this one does.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2000_:
The bond that grows and develops between a
Trainer and a Pokémon is often referred to as
sync strength...
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2100_:
And sync stones react to that strength, making
them glitter even more brightly.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2200_: But you already knew that, didn’t you?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2300_:
Due to my status as a Champion, I get challenged
to Pokémon battles constantly here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2400_:
But one of the great things about that is that I get
to see everyone’s sync stones shine whenever
I battle!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2500_:
The fact that I get to see them sparkle makes me
look forward to battling even more.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2700_:
Well, every sync stone shines a bit differently.
Each one is unique.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2800_:
Don’t get me wrong—I’m incredibly pleased by
that fact.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2900_:
But I believe there’s a well of even greater
potential hidden within these stones.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_3000_:
That’s why... [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Do you have time for a battle right now?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_3100_:
Against you, my sync stone could potentially shine
brighter than it ever has before, as long as we
fight with all our might!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0401_3300_: All right! Thanks for agreeing to help.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0402_3500_: All right! Thanks for agreeing to help.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_3600_: Let’s give this everything we’ve got, Metagross!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_3700_:
We’re going to make our sync stone sparkle like
it’s never sparkled before!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1101_3900_:
As Steven and [Name:PlayerNickname ] faced
off, their sync stones shone magnificently!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_4100_:
You and your Pokémon truly are a spectacular
sync pair, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_4200_:
When a Trainer and a Pokémon join together
with a bond as strong as yours...
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_4300_:
that strength really does seem to reflect in their
sync stone.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_4400_:
Just like how polishing a gemstone makes
it sparkle, it seems we sync pairs need to
hone our skills in order to shine as well!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_4500_:
Please, will you join me again sometime soon?
I’d like to polish our battling skills together!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0401_4700_:
Great answer! I knew my instincts about you
were correct.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0402_4900_:
Hah! Great answer! I knew my instincts about you
were correct.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_5000_:
Soon, Metagross and I will be shining brighter
than ever before! And I’m sure you and your
Pokémon will do the same.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_5200_:
when it comes down to it, I’m just the strongest
there is right now.
